content: pattern for a knitted heart square great as a dishcloth or washcloth or with other squares to form a blanket or afghan - could look great with my cat square or little unicorn square both chart and written pattern are included finished square using dk yarn and 4 mm - us6 uk8 - needles approximately 22 cm x 22 cm 8 5 inches x 8 5 inches this square is the same size as my other free squares - together they could make a fantastic afghan
